setupRequired.title: KYC Verification Required
setupRequired.subtitle: Complete verification to access operational features

missing.title: KYC Verification Not Submitted
missing.description: You need to complete KYC (Know Your Customer) verification to access operational features like orders, payments, and analytics.

pending.title: Verification in Progress
pending.description: Your KYC documents are being reviewed by our team. Sit tight! All operational features will be automatically unlocked once verification is approved.
pending.noteText: Reviews typically complete within 1-2 business days. You'll receive an email notification once approved.

rejected.title: KYC Verification Rejected
rejected.defaultReason: Your KYC submission was rejected. Please review the requirements and resubmit your documents.

setupRequired.helpText: KYC verification is required for payment processing and financial operations.

missing.message: Complete KYC verification to access operational features (orders, payments, analytics)

pending.message: Verification in progress - All features will be unlocked once your KYC is approved (usually 1-2 business days)

rejected.message: KYC verification rejected - Please review the rejection reason and resubmit your documents

documents.title: KYC Documents
documents.description: Review all submitted documents for verification

owner.title: Owner Information
owner.description: Contact details for the venue owner

approveDialog.title: Approve KYC Verification
approveDialog.description: Are you sure you want to approve KYC for {{venueName}}? This will allow them to accept payments.

rejectDialog.title: Reject KYC Verification
rejectDialog.description: Please provide a reason for rejecting {{venueName}}'s KYC submission. They will receive this feedback.
rejectDialog.selectDocumentsHelp: Select specific documents that need to be resubmitted. If no documents are selected, all documents will be marked as rejected.
rejectDialog.noDocuments: No documents have been uploaded yet. All documents will be marked as rejected.
rejectDialog.reasonPlaceholder: Explain why the KYC is being rejected...

toast.approveDescription: {{venueName}} has been approved and can now accept payments.
toast.rejectDescription: {{venueName}} has been notified of the rejection.
